snippet.title: Boeing Pushes Back Delivery of 747-8
snippet.description: Boeing (said today the delivery of its new 747-8 Freighter cargo plane is delayed until mid-year of 2011. The plan had been expected in the fourth quarter of 2010. read »

snippet.title: CYS Investments' Series B Preferred Stock Shares Cross 8% Yield Mark
snippet.description: In trading on Monday, shares of CYS Investments, Inc.'s 7.50% Series B Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock (NYSE: CYS.PRB) were yielding above the 8% mark based on its quarterly dividend (annualized to $1.875), with shares changing hands as low as $23.42 on the day. snippet.title: Surge Energy (SGY) Shares Cross 8% Yield Mark
snippet.description: In trading on Tuesday, shares of Surge Energy Inc. (Toronto: SGY) were yielding above the 8% mark based on its monthly dividend (annualized to $0.54), with the stock changing hands as low as $6.69 on the day. snippet.title: Oracle​Voice: 8 Reasons To Love Java 8
snippet.description: Java, the programming language used by millions of developers, is now even better.
